|brand = SOHOware |model = SFA110A |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/16/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SOHOware_SFA110A |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 10d9 |device_id = 0531 |subvendor_id = 15e8 |subdevice_id = 8110 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = L4OM400 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:80:C6
|chip1 = Macronix;MX98715A; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = tulip |windriv =
|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->
|is_manuf = No |manuf = CIS Technology |manuf_model = WS-M400 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = schematics, block diagram, Has Boot ROM socket |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/08/1998 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = none |connactled = green |spdledcolor = yellow |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "PL3400022003" and "FCC ID : L4OM400" is silkscreened on the top of the card. :"MADE IN TAIWAN" is etched into the top layer of the bottom of the card. :A '''NDC''' label on the back of the card identifies the model as SFA110A (w/ S/N: 5J1027980). :A manuf. part label contains the MAC (<barcode>, 0080C6EAEBF8), the P/N (P/N: 9S-821000-01 A4), and some other stuff (MADE IN TAIWAN 00-10). This card is using MX98715AEC (MX98715A).
The '''L4O''' grantee code is that of '''CIS Technology''', which is presumed to be the actual manufacturer. :The FCC docs refer to the device as being model ''WS-M400''.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
